scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy:development
scripts.deploy:development: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "npm run deploy:backend -- -s development && npm run deploy:frontend -- -s development"
scripts.deploy:production: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run deploy:backend -- -s production && npm run deploy:frontend -- -s production"
